user.title: Configure NoIP Monitor
user.description:
Enter your NoIP authentication credentials to monitor your dynamic DNS hostnames.

Your credentials are used to authenticate with the NoIP API and retrieve hostname information.

data_description.username: Your NoIP account username or email address
data_description.password: Your NoIP account password (or application-specific password if using 2FA)
data_description.2fa_token: 6-digit code from your authenticator app (only if you have 2FA enabled and use your regular password)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to NoIP API
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication credentials. Please verify your username, password, and 2FA token (if applicable).
